sentences.en: a bacon, lettuce and tomato sandwich
sentences.cn: 咸肉、生菜加番茄三明治

sentences.en: a bacon, lettuce and tomato sandwich
A dry sandwich is a drag to eat.
a peanut butter and jelly sandwich
sentences.cn: 一份花生酱加果酱三明治

sentences.en: A surprising number of customers order the same sandwich every day.
sentences.cn: 每天点同一种三明治的顾客多得惊人。

sentences.en: Carefully split the sponge ring, then sandwich the two halves together with whipped cream.
sentences.cn: 小心地切开海绵蛋糕圈，然后在两半中间夹上生奶油。
他咬了一口他的三明治。

sentences.en: He forked an egg onto a piece of bread and folded it into a sandwich.
sentences.cn: 他用叉子叉了个鸡蛋放在面包上，然后把面包片折起做成了三明治。

sentences.en: He fortified himself with a sandwich.
sentences.cn: 他吃了一块三明治,以增强体力.

sentences.en: He had a hangover, so he ordered a sandwich to settle his stomach.
sentences.cn: 他有一点儿宿醉, 所以点了三明治让胃舒服一点.

sentences.en: He satisfied his hunger with a sandwich and milk.
sentences.cn: 他以三明治和牛奶充饥.

sentences.en: Right, who's for a toasted sandwich then?
sentences.cn: 好吧，谁想要吐司三明治？

sentences.en: She avoided the issue by ordering a turkey sandwich.
sentences.cn: 她点了份火鸡三明治，以此来避开这个重要问题。

sentences.en: She could have made the sandwich herself; her mum needn'thave bothered to do anything.
sentences.cn: 她本来可以自己做三明治的；她妈妈原本不必费心做任何事情。

sentences.en: To make a ham sandwich you put a slice of ham between two slices of bread.
sentences.cn: 把一片火腿夹在两片面包之间就做成了火腿三明治.

words.tran_cn: 夹入；挤进；把...[食品]做成三明治

phrases.phrase: a sandwich (或 two sandwiches) short of a picnic

phrases.tran_cn: 乳酪三明治；之士三文治
夹层梁；层结梁；多层叠合梁
n. 挂在身上的广告牌
三明治世代（同时扶养与照顾父母和子女的人）
三明治群岛（夏威夷群岛的旧称）
夹层板；多层板；多层垫板
夹层结构；三明治结构；叠层构造

phrases.phrase: the meat (或 filling) in the sandwich
phrases.tran_cn: 夹在对立的双方之间的人，处于左右为难境地的人

trans.tran_cn: 三明治，夹心面包，状似三明治的东西
trans.tran_en: two pieces of bread with cheese, meat, cooked egg etc between them
two pieces of bread with cheese, meat, cooked egg etc between them
If you sandwich two things together with something else, you put that other thing between them. If you sandwich one thing between two other things, you put it between them.
